summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 5, University Park Addition, being the alley between 15th Avenue Northeast and 16th Avenue Northeast, from East 52nd Street to East 55th Street, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6381, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
